content:
1. Ensure you have "Show Unified Inbox" enabled from general settings > display. 2. Tick "Unify" on each folder containing emails you wish to show within the Unified inbox. The unify option is located under: Account > Manage Folders > [Folder Name].

Note that only the Unified Inbox is supported. There's currently no Unified Sent, Draft, Outbox, Trash or Spam folders.
creator: platform34
